title: HARNESSING HEARTBREAK FOR THE VACCINE INJURED
cleaned_text: My heart breaks for this father. May God/s justice come swift, may the Karma match the depths of this evil. There is a special place in Hell for those that do NOTHING to stand up for what is right, for the truth. The Storm is upon us. A new day will dawn. A new world of health, free energy, freedom, abundance and love. God see’s everything.

opengraph.title: HARNESSING HEARTBREAK FOR THE VACCINE INJURED
opengraph.description: Ernesto Ramirez, who’s teenage son tragically died after receiving the COVID Vaccine, joins Del along with singer/songwriter Brad Skistamas of Five Time August, to share their heartbreaking stories and discuss their tireless fight to bring awareness. Watch out for 2 live performances from Five Times August.
